      • remoteAddress

        java.lang.String remoteAddress()
        The client IP address. retrieves the last untrusted proxy from the Forwarded-Headers or the X-Forwarded-*-Headers.

      • secure

        boolean secure()
        Is the client using SSL?

        The request host.

        java.lang.String path()
        The URI path.

      • acceptLanguages

        java.util.List<Lang> acceptLanguages()
        The Request Langs extracted from the Accept-Language header and sorted by preference (preferred first).

      • acceptedTypes

        java.util.List<play.api.http.MediaRange> acceptedTypes()
        Returns:
        The media types set in the request Accept header, sorted by preference (preferred first)

      • accepts

        boolean accepts(java.lang.String mimeType)
        Check if this request accepts a given media type.
        Returns:
        true if mimeType is in the Accept header, otherwise false

      • queryString

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> queryString()
        The query string content.

      • getQueryString

        java.lang.String getQueryString(java.lang.String key)
        Helper method to access a queryString parameter.

        Http.Cookies cookies()
        Returns:
        the request cookies

      • cookie

        Http.Cookie cookie(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the cookie to retrieve
        Returns:
        the cookie, if found, otherwise null

      • headers

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> headers()
        Retrieves all headers.
        Returns:
        a map of of header name to headers with case-insensitive keys

      • getHeader

        java.lang.String getHeader(java.lang.String headerName)
        Retrieves a single header.
        Parameters:
        headerName - The name of the header (case-insensitive)

      • hasHeader

        boolean hasHeader(java.lang.String headerName)
        Checks if the request has the header.
        Parameters:
        headerName - The name of the header (case-insensitive)
